channel.title: About WriteFreely
channel.description:
A simple, federated writing platform.
[WriteFreely](https://writefreely.org/) is free and open source software for starting a minimalist, federated blog — or an entire community.
## Project
* Source code: https://github.com/writeas/writefreely * Bug reports: [on GitHub](https://github.com/writeas/writefreely/issues/new?labels=%E2%9D%93+bug%3F&template=bug_report.md) * Feature requests: [on the Write.as forum](https://discuss.write.as/c/feedback/feature-requests) * General Discussion: SocialHub *(here)* and [on the Write.as forum](https://discuss.write.as/c/writefreely)
## Chat
* IRC: #writefreely on freenode.net
## Updates
* Official blog: https://blog.writefreely.org * Fediverse: `@writefreely@blog.writefreely.org` * RSS: https://blog.writefreely.org/feed/ * Email: https://blog.writefreely.org/subscribe * [@writeas_dev@abunchtell.com](https://m.abunchtell.com/@writeas_dev) * [#wfdev](https://m.abunchtell.com/tags/wfdev)
## Find an Instance
* https://writefreely.org/instances * https://fediverse.network/writefreely * https://the-federation.info/writefreely
## Support the Project
We fund WriteFreely development by offering hosted services. This happens through our flagship instance, [Write.as](https://write.as). Buying a paid Write.as account or any of [our add-ons](https://write.as/extend) directly pays the people building WriteFreely.
**Individual Accounts**: [Write.as Pro](https://write.as/pro)
**Multi-user Communities**: [WriteFreely.host](https://writefreely.host)
